subject: Public Speaking
title: Fear Appeals
description: A quick, practical guide to Fear Appeals.

hook.text: Scare tactics work but only with a solution attached.

buildup.text: Fear without a way out creates paralysis, not action.

discovery.text: The ideal fear appeal: here's the threat AND here's what to do.

twist.text: Too much fear backfires. Audiences shut down and disengage.

climax.text: Calibrated fear with clear solutions motivates action.

punchline.text: Scare them. Then show the solution.

quiz.question: When do fear appeals work?
options: When paired with a clear solution
